verses: Salt is good, but if the salt has lost its saltiness, how will you make it salty again? Have salt in yourselves, and be at peace with one another.
If I then, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also ought to wash one anotherâ€™s feet.
A new commandment I give to you, that you love one another: just as I have loved you, you also are to love one another.
